video_prompt: Ant navigates glowing moss and bubbling fungi in a fantastical, macro cavern. Lighting shifts to reveal more of the enclosed space.
image_prompt: Macro shot of a red-orange ant in a fantastical, glowing cave environment. Focus on intricate details of the ant, glowing amber mushroom, vibrant turquoise moss with orange spheres, and ethereal floating bubbles. Dramatic lighting creates a surreal atmosphere, evoking a microscopic, magical world. Stylized CGI rendering.
refined_video_prompt: An ant scuttles, antennae twitching, across pulsating, glowing moss. Bioluminescent spores gently drift upwards. Fungi bubble, releasing iridescent spheres that float and pop. Dynamic lighting undulates through the macro cavern, causing shadows to dance and revealing deeper, shimmering recesses.
